column4: i have multiple occurrences of "AdityaGada" in html files in current folder & sub-folders, now i want to replace all the occurrences of "AdityaGada" to "KashyapGada", what do i run in terminal? Any help will be appreciated
best read up on sed, or use something like vim/gedit if thats to complicated
does sed replace all occurrences of some string to another string in current folder & subfolders ?
sed is a serial line editor, you can tell it what patterns to search for and what to do with it
